name: Post Matric Scholarships Scheme for Minorities
eligibility: Post-matric students from minority communities pursuing education, including engineering.

name: Merit Cum Means Scholarship for Professional and Technical Courses CS (Minorities)
eligibility: Minority students pursuing professional and technical courses, including engineering.

name: Scholarships for Top Class Education for Students with Disabilities
eligibility: Students with disabilities pursuing top class education.

name: Prime Minister’s Scholarship Scheme for Central Armed Police Forces and Assam Rifles
eligibility: Wards of Central Armed Police Forces and Assam Rifles personnel.

name: Post Matric Scholarship for Students with Disabilities
eligibility: Post-matric students with disabilities.

name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship for College and University Students
eligibility: College and University students.

name: AICTE – Swanath Scholarship Scheme (Technical Diploma/Degree) 2024-25
eligibility: Students pursuing a technical diploma or degree course from an AICTE approved institution.

name: AICTE-Saksham Scholarship Scheme 2024-25
eligibility: Differently-abled students pursuing a technical degree/diploma from an AICTE recognized institution.

name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship for Girls 2024-25
eligibility: Girl students pursuing a technical degree/diploma from an AICTE recognized institution.

name: PRERANA Post Matric Scholarship for ST/SC/OBC/SEBC/EBC Communities
eligibility: Post-matric students from ST/SC/OBC/SEBC/EBC communities of Odisha.

name: Swami Vivekananda Merit Cum Means Scholarship for Minorities, West Bengal
eligibility: Meritorious minority students of West Bengal.

name: Post-matric (Other Than Intermediate) Scholarship for OBC, Uttar Pradesh
eligibility: OBC students of Uttar Pradesh pursuing post-matric courses other than intermediate.

name: Post-matric (Other Than Intermediate) Scholarship for Minorities, Uttar Pradesh
eligibility: Minority students of Uttar Pradesh pursuing post-matric courses other than intermediate.

name: Post-matric Scholarship for Disabled, Maharashtra
eligibility: Disabled students of Maharashtra pursuing post-matric studies.

name: Rajarshi Shahu Maharaj Scholarship, Maharashtra
eligibility: Students of Maharashtra.

name: Technical Education Scholarships for PG/Degree/Engineering Courses, Himachal Pradesh
eligibility: Students pursuing PG/Degree/Engineering Courses in Himachal Pradesh.

name: Nagaland State Merit Scholarship
eligibility: Meritorious students of Nagaland.

name: NEC Merit Scholarship NER
eligibility: Meritorious students from the North Eastern Region.

name: Bharti Airtel Scholarship Program
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: Aspire Scholarship Program
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: Mohan T Advani Centennial Scholarship Programme
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: Legrand Empowering Scholarship Program
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: Appinventiv ‘Edu Boost’ Scholarship Program
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: Tata Capital Pankh Scholarship Program
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: Ratti Chhatr Scholarship Program
eligibility: Engineering students.

name: KSB Scholarship and Mentorship Program
eligibility: Girl students pursuing engineering.

name: Infosys Foundation STEM Stars Scholarship Program
eligibility: Girl students pursuing STEM courses, including engineering.

name: Rolls-Royce Wings4Her Scholarship for Women Engineering Students
eligibility: Women engineering students.

name: North South Foundation (NSF) Scholarship
eligibility: Students who have passed Class XII, wish to pursue engineering or medicine, and have a family annual income less than ₹90,000.

name: IET India Scholarship Awards
eligibility: Students in the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, or 4th year of a full-time regular undergraduate engineering programme approved by AICTE/UGC.

name: Swami Dayanand Education Foundation Merit-cum-Means Scholarships
eligibility: Students pursuing engineering, IT, pharmacy, medical and architecture courses from a recognized government or private institution in India.

name: Yashad-Sumedha Scholarship Programme
eligibility: Talented students from economically backward society studying in the first semester of the BTech programme at any government college.
